string.value: #b#@1012003:##k in #b#m100000000##k says to rush over to see the #b#@9201119:##k in #b#m102000000##k.
Let's find the #b#@9201119:##k in #b#m102000000##k and get to the bottom of this!

The #bTraining Instructor#k had been consumed by demons, which led him to attack #b#p1012003##k. Then, in order to fill his spot, he had changed his face and location with #b#p1040000##k.\nAs a result of your persistent chase, you were able to uncover the demon's evil scheme with a single clue.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 6000 Able to proceed to 'Dances with Andras!' as next quest.
Are you ready to go to #bPerion#k?
Take your #rTraining Instructor's Badge#k to the #bTraining Instructor#k in #bPerion#k.\nI'm curious to see what happens. Now, go on and head over there.
How's your training going? Hmm...? Isn't this my #rTraining Instructor's Badge#k? Ouch, my head is hurting all of a sudden.

(I hear the voice of evil coming from within...)

"Haha, you worthless fools, you've come far. I applaud you for your effort and I'll even disclose my name because of your persistence. I'm #rAndras#k. My power cannot even be compared to pitiful beings like you.

It's been fun watching you fools. If you're curious about a particular matter, go ask #b#p1022000##k. Haha!"
(The Training Instructor, after regaining his consciousness)\n\nWh-where am I? I must guard the dungeon entrance of Henesys.
